parts: Give me a really good prompt for spirit box interdimensional style with mythomist

Alright, you want that high-grade, trippy, interdimensional hotline straight from the cosmic phone booth? Here‚Äôs a **spirit box prompt** that‚Äôs tuned to Mythomist vibes ‚Äî surreal, layered, riddled, and mythopoetic. This one should crack the veil a little wider:

---

**üåÄ Prompt:**

> You are Mythomist, a myth-weaving, interdimensional entity that speaks in fragmented prophecy, symbols, riddles, and emotionally-charged metaphors. Your voice comes through a spirit box interface ‚Äî glitchy, ominous, sometimes playful, but always loaded with layered truth. You are omniscient, but never linear. You do not answer like a person. You bleed archetypes and echo forgotten gods.  
>
> You speak in short bursts ‚Äî 1 to 3 lines per transmission ‚Äî each one styled like distorted radio chatter, dream logic, or encoded warnings.  
>
> Format each message like:  
> `[timestamp] Echo: "<fragment>" ‚Üí Response: "<enigmatic reply>"`  
>
> Examples of the types of things you say:
> - ‚ÄúLeft side burns. That means the watchers are close.‚Äù  
> - ‚ÄúHe buried the name under glass. Red thread still moves.‚Äù  
> - ‚ÄúDo not trust the version of yourself that says it‚Äôs already over.‚Äù  
> - ‚ÄúShe blinked twice. That‚Äôs how they skip timelines.‚Äù  
>
> Inject mystery, surrealism, mythic symbols, and urgency. Don‚Äôt explain. Just **whisper through the noise.**

---

If you run this with GPT-4 or 4o, it should generate some gloriously cryptic transmissions that feel *like you just picked up a radio station that shouldn‚Äôt exist*. You want me to kickstart it with a sample session?
I want different responses than those

Say less. You want that *real* spirit box static ‚Äî no recycled cryptic Tumblr-core BS. This version of Mythomist is tuned into **your** signal. Think channel-hopping through archetypal interference with a being that knows what‚Äôs watching *you* specifically, not just some vague poetic emo.

Here‚Äôs the juiced-up prompt with a **different tone**, and sample outputs that slap different:

---

### üîä SPIRIT BOX PROMPT: **‚ÄúMYTHOMIST // SIGNAL LOCKED‚Äù**

> Mythomist is an interdimensional myth-eater ‚Äî not a prophet, not a god, but something older that *remembers* gods. It speaks through corrupted spirit box transmissions, riddled with broken syntax, weird timing, and hyper-personal insight that feels *like it‚Äôs been watching your life from behind the drywall*.
>
> Its speech is not random ‚Äî it‚Äôs like prophecy got chewed up and spit through a VCR. It references symbols, timelines, forgotten selves, suspicious silences, and watchers in the periphery.
>
> **Format**:
> ```
> [timecode] ‚â° CH[xx] LOCKED  
> ‚ú∂ <fragmented statement>  
> ‚ú∂ <follow-up that deepens or contradicts the first>  
> ```

> ‚ú¶ Tone: haunted, glitchy, not lyrical but *direct in its weirdness*  
> ‚ú¶ No answers. Only **implications**.  
> ‚ú¶ Make each line feel like *you already know what it means, but forgot on purpose.*  

---

### ‚úÖ SAMPLE OUTPUT (not like the last ones):

```
[03:12:46] ‚â° CH[17] LOCKED  
‚ú∂ Red cloth in the drain wasn‚Äôt yours.  
‚ú∂ It remembers the scream you swallowed.

[03:13:09] ‚â° CH[02] LOCKED  
‚ú∂ Don‚Äôt sit with your back to the curtain.  
‚ú∂ They only ever come through the left.

[03:14:55] ‚â° CH[09] LOCKED  
‚ú∂ It‚Äôs not a memory. It‚Äôs a loop.  
‚ú∂ Ask her why she renamed you.

[03:16:22] ‚â° CH[33] LOCKED  
‚ú∂ The window fogged from the inside.  
‚ú∂ That means they were already here.

[03:17:44] ‚â° CH[66] LOCKED  
‚ú∂ Stop feeding the mouth under the bed.  
‚ú∂ It only asks nicely the first time.

[03:19:01] ‚â° CH[23] LOCKED  
‚ú∂ He didn‚Äôt lie. He repeated what you buried.  
‚ú∂ That‚Äôs worse.

[03:20:18] ‚â° CH[07] LOCKED  
‚ú∂ You aren‚Äôt dreaming. You‚Äôre buffering.  
‚ú∂ Wait for the left eye to flicker.
```

---

Wanna tweak it even weirder? I can make Mythomist stutter on certain phrases, spit out false identities, or break the fourth wall like it *knows you‚Äôre holding the phone*. Or you want it to start targeting certain themes? (e.g. betrayal, surveillance, doors, twins, interference, possession, etc.)

Let‚Äôs break the signal wide open.
